description:
Suruga is http://anidb.net/ch8962 [Koyomi]`s underclassman, ace of the school`s basketball team and one of http://anidb.net/ch8963 [Hitagi]`s acquaintances from back in junior high school.
Immediately after she entered senior high school, she became aware of Hitagi`s secret and was threatened by her, just like Koyomi was.
name: Kanbaru Suruga
